steps: Enter a valid keyword in the 'Meklējamais vārds vai frāze' input field
requirements.expected_result: Search results related to 'auto' are displayed

steps: Leave the 'Meklējamais vārds vai frāze' input field empty
requirements.expected_result: An error message or prompt indicating that the keyword field is required

requirements.scenario: Search with special characters in keyword
steps: Enter special characters in the 'Meklējamais vārds vai frāze' input field
requirements.expected_result: An error message or no results found message, depending on how the system handles special characters

steps: Select a valid section from the 'Sadaļa' dropdown
requirements.expected_result: Search results related to the 'Transports' section are displayed

steps: Do not change the default selection in the 'Sadaļa' dropdown
requirements.expected_result: An error message or prompt indicating that a section selection is required

steps: Select a valid city from the 'Pilsēta, rajons' dropdown
requirements.expected_result: Search results related to the selected city are displayed

steps: Select 'Visi sludinājumi' from the 'Pilsēta, rajons' dropdown
requirements.expected_result: Search results from all cities are displayed

requirements.scenario: Search with a specific time period
steps: Select a specific time period from the 'Meklēt par periodu' dropdown
requirements.expected_result: Search results from the last week are displayed

steps: Do not change the default selection in the 'Meklēt par periodu' dropdown
requirements.expected_result: Search results from all time periods are displayed
